name: Paper or Plastic (zeoxo)
description:
Try your best to catch as many groceries as possible! Collect coins and use them to unlock new skins! Easy to learn, hard to master! Infinite arcade replayability! Try to beat your high score! Unlock dozens of cool skins! Featuring Original sound design from Tyler Shields - Original Music - Original SFX 100% Free to play!

Try it now!

*This is a complete remake of the original paper or plastic that originally launched in 2016 on iOS. This version features various improvements to gameplay and other systems and has been completely rewritten in the Godot engine.

*Coming soon to Android and iOS
